summary: This bill, the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic Act, aims to rename the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Las Cruces, New Mexico, to the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic. The bill specifies that any existing references to the clinic in federal documents should be updated to reflect the new name. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Vasquez and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
